articles.author: Jane Englefield
articles.title: LG reveals "world's first" wireless transparent OLED TV - Dezeen
articles.description: LG has unveiled the Signature OLED T, a television with a transparent screen that was on display at this year's Consumer Electronics Show.
articles.content:
Electronics brand LG has unveiled the Signature OLED T, a television with a transparent screen that was on display at this year's Consumer Electronics Show.

articles.title: Gigantic Terror Beast Worm Discovered In Greenland - Giant Freakin Robot
articles.description: A new species of worms that roamed Earth long ago has been discovered in Greenland, and its existence is absolutely terrifying.
